body:
Comment 5: 
To update to the latest release:

hg pull
hg update release

See also: http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#tmp_146 (Synchronize your client) for
updating to the tip of 
the repository.

To see pending changes in your client:

hg p


I am closing this issue at this point since this appears to be an out-of-sync client
rather than a bug in godoc.

- gri
_Status changed to **Done**._
